original_text: Laban also said, ‘I have put this special stone here, and the heap of stones near it. They stand there between your land and my land.
korean_text: 라반이 또 야곱에게 이르되 내가 나와 너 사이에 둔 이 무더기를 보라 또 이 기둥을 보라

sentences.original_text: I have put this special stone here
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이 특별한 돌을 여기에 놓았다

sentences.original_text: and the heap of stones near it
between your land and my land
